multiagent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • multiagent.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a UAV. =================== README ====================== NOT ALL THE ACTION IN THE CURRENT CLASS HAVE TO BE DEFINED. Think carefully to what you choose to do and complete the action needed by your implementation. IF YOU THINK that your implementation needs more methods than those here proposed, you can implement them. Be careful to follow the guidelines and be ready to motivate your changes. ===========================================================
    Version:
    1.1, 1.0 - May 22, 2013
    Author:
    Albani Dario, Federico Patota, Gabriele Buondonno
    See Also:

      • Agent

        public Agent(int id,
             Cell c,
             World world)
        Constructor for this class.
        Parameters:
        id - identifier for this agent.
        c - initial agent position.
        world - an instance of the world used to retrieve information and tasks

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns the agent identifier.
        Returns:
        this agent identifier.

      • getPosition

        public Cell getPosition()
        Returns the current position of the agent.
        Returns:
        the current position of this agent.

      • getCurrentTask

        public Task getCurrentTask()
        Returns the task currently under execution by the agent.
        Returns:
        the task currently under execution by this agent.

      • emptypTask

        public boolean emptypTask()
        Checks whether the pending tasks list is empty.
        Returns:
        true if the pending tasks list is empty, otherwise false.

      • addpTask

        public void addpTask(Task t)
        Adds this cell to the pending tasks list only if has weeds and is not harvested

      • removepTask

        public void removepTask(Task t)
        Removes this location from the pending tasks list.

      • getNextpTask

        public Task getNextpTask()
        Returns a pending task from the pending tasks list, according to some priority. If the list is empty, it returns null.
        Returns:
        the next pending task to be auctioned.

      • nextAction

        public Action nextAction()
        The world calls this method to ask the agent for the next action to be executed. The agent returns the action currently under execution.
        Returns:
        the action that needs to be executed.

      • cancelTask

        public void cancelTask()
        Deletes current task setting it to null.

      • assignTasks

        public void assignTasks(java.util.List<Agent> agents)
        The simulator asks the agent to allocate the pending tasks. The pending tasks are either the list of pending tasks available in the current class or the task still available in the world (this depend to your implementation). The tasks are immediately assigned according to the specification of your exercise. The agent list is provided by the simulator.
        Parameters:
        agents - the agents list.

      • assignTasks

        public void assignTasks(java.util.List<Agent> agents,
                        Task task)
        CNP - implement your own logic (e.g. for CNP the agent is the manager of task) The simulator asks the agent to allocate the pending tasks. The pending tasks are either the list of pending tasks available in the current class or the task still available in the world (this depend to your implementation). The tasks are immediately assigned according to the specification of your exercise. The agent list is provided by the simulator.
        Parameters:
        agents - the agents list.

      • updateState

        public void updateState(Cell nextPosition,
                        Task nextTask)
        This method is called by the simulation environment to inform the agent about the outcome of its action, as provided by the World.
        Parameters:
        nextPosition - the agent new position.
        nextTask - a new task discovered by this agent. If null, there is no next task.

      • bidForTask

        public Bid bidForTask(Task task)
        The requests for Bids are issued by the agent. In the first implementation an agent can only bid if it has no current task.
        Parameters:
        task - the task which the request is issued for.
        Returns:
        a bid for the given task.

      • acceptTask

        public boolean acceptTask(Task task)
        The acceptance requests are issued by the agent. In the first implementation an agent can only accept if it has no current task.
        Parameters:
        task - the task which the request is issued for.
        Returns:
        true if the task is accepted.
